mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, realm_id, count_since_equip, total_explore_count, total_equip_count, last_equip_time, daily_count, daily_reset_date, update_time FROM secret_realm_pity WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND realm_id = #{realmId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO secret_realm_pity (user_id, realm_id, count_since_equip, total_explore_count, total_equip_count, last_equip_time, daily_count, daily_reset_date, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{realmId}, #{countSinceEquip}, #{totalExploreCount}, #{totalEquipCount}, #{lastEquipTime}, #{dailyCount}, #{dailyResetDate}, #{updateTime}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count_since_equip = #{countSinceEquip}, total_explore_count = #{totalExploreCount}, total_equip_count = #{totalEquipCount}, last_equip_time = #{lastEquipTime}, daily_count = #{dailyCount}, daily_reset_date = #{dailyResetDate}, update_time = #{updateTime}
